siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Generate energy intrinsically
frontmatter.description: Use intrinsic motivation to generate energy. Extrinsic motivators are limiting.

frontmatter.title: It's much easier to balance on a moving bike
frontmatter.description: Keep moving to find balance. It's much easier to balance on a moving bike.

frontmatter.title: Build momentum via focused thinking in new setting
frontmatter.description: When feeling stuck or unmotivated, change the setting and dedicate ten minutes of focused thinking. Build momentum via focused thinking in new setting.
